com.marklogic.semantics.jena.client

Class JenaDatabaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.semantics.jena.client.JenaDatabaseClient

  • public class JenaDatabaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to encapsulate access to the Java API's DatabaseClient for Jena users. Access the underlying Java API client with getClient();
